## ssxResolveEns variable

Resolves ENS data supported by SSX.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ssxResolveEns: (provider: ethers.providers.BaseProvider, address: string, resolveEnsOpts?: {
    domain?: boolean;
    avatar?: boolean;
}) => Promise<SSXEnsData>
```
